title: Nomination Press Release - Assistant Attorney General | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




February 11, 2009

 



Nomination Press Release - Assistant Attorney General




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary                                                                   For Immediate Release                  February 11, 2009 Nomination Sent to the Senate:      David S. Kris, of Maryland, to be an Assistant Attorney General, vice J. Patrick Rowan, resigned. ###
